2 Warga Bekasi Tewas Usai Tenggak Miras Oplosan
01 Nov 2019, 12:02 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Iswanto (38) dan Ahmad Bubun (46) tewas usai pesta miras oplosan di Bekasi. Satu korban lainnya bernama Cecep Supriandi dirawat di rumah sakit karena ikut menenggak minuman yang sama.
Pesta miras oplosan terjadi pada Senin (28/10). Korban saat itu membeli miras dan meminumnya bersama-sama.
"Korban Iswanto bersama korban Cecep membeli minuman jenis ginseng oplosan dan minum di rumah Bubun sampai jam 00.30 WIB. Setelah itu mereka bubar," kata Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Argo Yuwono dalam keterangannya kepada wartawan, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Pesta miras oplosan ini digelar di rumah Bubun di Tambun Utara, Kabupaten Bekasi. Usai meminum miras, Argo mengatakan para korban kembali ke rumahnya masing-masing.
Satu hari setelah menenggak miras oplosan, ketiga korban dilarikan ke rumah sakit. Korban Iswanto lebih dulu meninggal dunia dan setelahnya disusul korban Bubun yang dinyatakan tewas saat dirawat di rumah sakit.
"Tanggal 29 Oktober, jam 23.00 WIB korban Iswanto dibawa ke RSUD Bekasi. Namun, hari Rabu tanggal 30 Oktober 2019 Jam 17.00 WIB korban dinyatakan meninggal dunia," kata Argo.
"Selanjutnya pada tanggal 31 Oktober 2019 sekitar Jam 20.00 WIB korban Bubun meninggal," sambungnya.
Argo belum merinci penyebab pasti kematian 2 warga Bekasi setelah menenggak miras oplosan itu. Argo hanya menyebut kasus itu sedang ditangani oleh Polsek Bekasi Timur.
"Kasus ditangani Sektor Bekasi Timur," pungkas Argo.

2 Bekasi Residents Killed After Drinking Alcohol Oplosan
01 Nov 2019, 12:02 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Iswanto (38) and Ahmad Bubun (46) died after an adulterated alcoholic party in Bekasi. Another victim named Cecep Supriandi was hospitalized for taking the same drink.
Mixed alcohol party took place on Monday (10/28). The victim bought alcohol and drank it together.
"The Iswanto victim and the Cecep victim bought mixed ginseng drinks and drank at Bubun's house until 00.30 WIB. After that they dispersed," said Head of Jakarta Police Public Relations Commissioner Argo Yuwono in his statement to reporters on Friday (11/01/2019).
This adulterated alcoholic party was held at Bubun's house in Tambun Utara, Bekasi Regency. After drinking alcohol, Argo said the victims returned to their homes.
One day after drinking mixed alcohol, the three victims were rushed to the hospital. Iswanto victim first died and afterwards followed by Bubun victim who was declared dead while being treated in hospital.
"On October 29, at 23.00 WIB the victim Iswanto was taken to the Bekasi District Hospital. However, on Wednesday, October 30, 2019 at 17.00 WIB the victim was declared dead," Argo said.
"Furthermore, on October 31, 2019 around 20.00 WIB the victim Bubun died," he continued.
Argo has not yet specified the exact cause of death of 2 Bekasi residents after drinking the mixed alcohol. Argo only said that the case was being handled by East Bekasi Police.
"Cases are handled by the East Bekasi Sector," concluded Argo.
